::Prowl::

Prowl nods at Iron Raptor's words, about to reply when the Ark comes 
into view. It was a pile of scrap, with bots working on it around 
it....

He sighs, remembering when the Ark was still in semi-perfect 
condition, before the constant attacks began.

"Another battle, probably," he says, looking at the Ark, not too 
surprised. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * Iron Raptor moved her neck a bit to get use to Prowls arms around 
it, 
> feeling his muscles tighten as she runs.
> She turned her head a bit to hear Prowls words as he spoke, keeping 
pace and 
> knowing that the Ark was only a few moments away.*
> 
> " She runs on her own power, she should still function. If not then 
I can 
> simply take a sample of her programming that's lefy and she can 
reconfigure 
> herself. Either way she'll tell me what's going on with this 
walking 
> nightmare I'm wearing..."
> 
> * And with that she came over a slow rise, and there in the 
distance was the 
> remains of the ark, far worse then Iron Raptor had thought.*
> 
> " How did this happen........"
> 
> * Her voice could barely be heard as she simply stoon on the rise, 
eyes side 
> and almost unable to believe what she saw...*
